Ryan Rynbrandt is a Professor of Political Science at Collin College,
where he has been teaching courses in American and Texan government for
nearly two decades. He is currently pursuing his PhD in Public Policy
and Political economy at UT Dallas.

## **Research Interests:**

*Human Happiness, Well-being and Thriving*

*Mental Health Interventions*

*Education Economics and Policy*

*Health Policy*
